summary.span: 在工作流设计图面上选择 时，为它所显示的所有标志符号类提供方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for all glyph classes that an displays when it is selected on the workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 对于显示在活动设计器上的标志符号，有些可以由用户选择，有些则不能。Some glyphs that are displayed on an activity designer can be selected by the user while others cannot. 当用户选择可选择的标志符号时，该标志符号在活动设计图面上的外观会发生更改。When a user selects a glyph that can be selected, the glyph changes appearance on the activity design surface. 对于当用户在活动设计图面上选择标志符号时会更改外观的所有标志符号类， 类是这些类的基类。The class is the base class for all glyph classes that change appearance when a user selects it on the activity design surface.

para.span: 从 继承时，必须重写以下成员：。

summary.span: 返回表示选定标志符号的抓取手柄的矩形数组。

span.span: Returns an array of rectangles that represents the selected glyph's grab handles.

returns.span: 要在选定标志符号上显示的抓取手柄的 数组。

span.span: A array of the grab handles to display on the selected glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抓取手柄是位于选定标志符号边缘的小框，用户可以通过抓取和移动它来拖动标志符号或调整标志符号的大小。Grab handles are the small boxes on the edge of a selected glyph that a user can grab and move to drag or resize the glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制用户选择的标志符号的所有元素，其中包括标志符号抓取手柄。 draws all elements of the glyph that the user selects, including the glyphs grab handles.
